title: WOLFIGHT-CLUB FOREST?
body: Abandon the nfts train (not exactly virgin anymore) and go straight on something crazy and still not seen on the current immature world of the metaverse as a forest of bloody wolves (human body, wolf head) where everyone can fight and kill everyone and / or create gangs with an Alpha. Using MOON in the marketplace to buy stones and knives, gadgets and even the rarest Alphas' heads (put on sale by those who scanned them.) Instead, WOLF would be earned by wolves after each kill to be hold/willingly used in the DAO for making their/our forest grow (es. museum, casinò, adopting real wolf puppies, Xmas party, or just new weapons or rules of the craziest metaverse of all). Ambitious project I know, but our bags full of MOON and wolf would not be in a hurry.
author: 0xd4981Ca51690087fc7547EBD4951360C9Cb0400d
